title: Menagerie of Mystery & Mayhem
description: Welcome to the magical world of 'Maddie Maze', a 14 year old girl who is about to embark on the adventure of a lifetime.As our story begins, Maddie is accepting a life in 'Nowhere, Colorado' as she woke up at the age of 8 and found her parents 'missing'. She is moved in with her only relative, that of her Aunt Bernice, her Fathers sister and quite the ecletic. Aunt Bernice would love for Maddie to act like a girl, but our Maddie is a tomboy and loves it. Join Maddie as her world is about to flip end over end with one re-occuring dream, a boys kiss and a book. "Menagerie of Mystery & Mayhem' is book one in this new YA series and is appropriate for readers 13+. It contains magic, mythical creatures and the paranormal. Exclusive to Crushing Hearts and Black Butterfly Publishing.
author: Rue Volley
